hosts.name: bashbunni
hosts.bio: I'm a software developer and content creator who builds mostly with Go. I do developer relations at @charmcli which is top tier ~fabulous~. I hack on open source projects (my own, Charm's, and others) in public on my Twitch channel. I also have a YouTube channel where I post more curated content on what I'm learning. I love long form content because I resent how social media platforms can feel like a highlight reel of people's lives, when in reality, we all struggle, especially when coding (heh).
